panels.visual: Marivielle giving Lunara a glowing seed
panels.dialogue: Marivielle: "Take this seed, dear. It's tied to the garden's magic. It may help restore balance if things go wrong." Lunara: "Thank you. We'll protect what the elves left behind."  ## CHAPTER 5: INTO THE COURIER TUNNELS

panels.visual: Val leading party to hidden entrance
panels.dialogue: Val: "I know a faster way through the courier tunnels. But... I'm not supposed to show outsiders." Malrik: "We're not outsiders. We're friends."
panels.location: Everpeak Citadel - hidden alleyway or side passage near courier guild entrance. Snow-covered stone walkway, white stone architecture. Narrow passage between buildings. Winter setting. Discrete wooden door or archway partially hidden. Medieval fantasy citadel architecture.

panels.visual: Entering tunnels Chalk symbols on walls Party descending
panels.dialogue: Val: "Everyone, blindfolds on. Guild rules." Prismor: "You're taking this seriously." Val: "These secrets keep the guild safe."

panels.visual: Malrik attempting to peek Val noticing
panels.dialogue: Malrik (thought): "Just a little look..." Val: "I saw that!"
